That sounds like a fantastic plan! Roasted vegetables and mashed potatoes are a classic combination that pairs perfectly with the rich, comforting flavor of braised lamb shanks. The earthy sweetness of carrots and Brussels sprouts will complement the bold, gamey flavor of the lamb, while the mashed potatoes will provide a creamy, comforting contrast.

Roasting the vegetables will bring out their natural sweetness and add a nice caramelized flavor to the dish. You might consider tossing the vegetables with some olive oil, salt, and pepper, and then roasting them in the oven until they're tender and lightly browned.

For the mashed potatoes, you could try adding some garlic and butter to give them an extra boost of flavor. You might also consider using a high-starch potato like Russet or Idaho to help them absorb all the juices from the lamb shanks.

Here's a tip: consider serving the lamb shanks with the braising liquid spooned over the top. This will help to keep the meat moist and flavorful, and the rich, savory sauce will pair perfectly with the roasted vegetables and mashed potatoes.

I think you're on the right track with your menu planning! Braised lamb shanks with roasted vegetables and mashed potatoes is a classic comfort food dish that's sure to please. Are you planning to serve any other sides or desserts with this meal, or do you think the lamb shanks will be the star of the show?
